ASP.NET.description: ASP.NET Core is an open-source and cross-platform framework for building modern cloud based internet connected applications, such as web apps, IoT apps and mobile backends.

Blazor.description: Blazor is a framework for building interactive client-side web UI with .NET

Entity Framework.description: Entity Framework Core is a modern object-database mapper for .NET. It supports LINQ queries, change tracking, updates, and schema migrations.

NUnit.description: NUnit is a unit-testing framework for all .Net languages.
